thread.title_full: Pleasant Hotel in Quiet Neighborhood - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jeff B
title: Pleasant Hotel in Quiet Neighborhood
text:
This property is in a very quiet area outside of the City Center but just a quick 5 minute walk to the Tube and all attractions. Nearby stores, restaurants and bars. 24 hour staffed desk, functional rooms, clean and well maintained.
Room Tip: Basement rooms are a bit "dungeonesque" with limited views but if you're looking for q... See more room tips
